content: Reading about Resource summary at "https://www.hl7.org/fhir/search.html#summary", Please help me to understand how to find out which all elements within a ValueSet resource would return when I search with summary parameter set to true ([base]/ValueSet?_summary=true). I cannot seem to find where ElementDefinition.isSummary is set for the ValueSet resource. Thanks much.
Thanks Grahame. I am unable to find it in http://hl7.org/fhir/valueset.profile.xml. Maybe it was removed? Thanks
it's there. did you look at the actual xml?
